briefTitle: Exemestane As Treatment In Neoadjuvant Setting For Operable Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Phase II Study Evaluating The Role Of Exemestane On Clinical And Pathologic Response Rates, And Its Aromatase Activity As Treatment In Neoadjuvant Setting For Operable Breast Cancer Patients.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To evaluate clinical and pathologic response rates following primary hormonal therapy by exemestane (Aromasin®)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Post-menopausal patients with unilateral breast cancer T2 to T4, N0-1, M0, non inflammatory, operable, hormonal receptors positive

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with bilateral breast cancer T4d, inflammatory, non operable, hormonal receptors negative
